posts.post_content: Good god. This is soooo typical of zombies; throw wayyyyy too much mana in a color that doesn't have sufficient mana ramp as is (be quiet, I don't care about Dark Ritual. This is one of those cards my friend uses for airsoft target practice.

posts.post_content: This thing is horrid. Because the ability isn't actually deathtouch, you can't split up damage, so it's kill ability is utterly useless with stuff like [Nemesis Mask](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nemesis Mask). It's waaaay overpriced for what you get- it should cost 2 less.
